title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.4 - Location

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available for public inspection and copying, upon request and
appointment, at the division office located in Albany, New York. Requests for
information and records may be made to that office by writing to: Privacy

Compliance Officer, Division of Housing and Community Renewal, Human Resource

Management Office, Hampton Plaza, 38-40 State Street, Albany, NY 12207, e-mail: DPCOfficer @nysdhcr.gov
(b) Whenever practicable, records shall also be made available at the division
office most convenient to a data subject. The privacy compliance officer may
designate another location in which a requestor may review records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2657.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
